snippet: The generals’ willingness to submit to civilian authority will determine whether last year’s uprising lives up to its billing as a democratic revolution or amounts instead to a coup.
abstract: Egypt's ruling generals’ willingness to submit to civilian authority will determine whether last year’s uprising lives up to its billing as a democratic revolution or amounts instead to a coup; it is among the most consequential questions for the country's allies, like the United States and Israel, and for the next Egyptian president.
lead_paragraph: The generals’ willingness to submit to civilian authority will determine whether last year’s uprising lives up to its billing as a democratic revolution or amounts instead to a coup.

headline.seo: Egypt Presidential Candidate Pledge to Protect Military
